'''''The King Is Dead, Long Live the King!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to interrupt the [[Emperor of Fire and Iron]]'s Searing Coronation attack by either defeating it or breaking its Pyro-infused horns using Elemental Reactions.
